TopicTitle: Why am I seeing the shadow of my vessel on the planet's surface from orbit?

Articles.Content:
If I'm in orbit, I can see a circular shadow of my vessel and any debris in physics range on the surface of the planet over 100 km away. This is true regardless of the body (tested on Kerbin, Mun, and Minmus). I shouldn't be able to see these shadows from this distance... what gives?

I do have scatterer & EVE installed, game version 1.8.1.

That's caused by the terrain shadow created by scatterer: https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/issues/68

Deactivating the terrain shadow or ignoring it are the only solutions for now.
